General.Name: Energi Mega Persada Tbk
General.Description: PT Energi Mega Persada Tbk, an upstream oil and gas company, engages in the explores for, develops, produces, and trades in crude oil, natural gas, and coal methane gas in Indonesia and Mozambique. It has interests in the oil and gas properties located in Bentu, Korinci Baru, Malacca Strait, Tonga, South CPP and "B' PSC, and Gebang in Sumatera; Kangean in East Java; Sangatta II in East Kalimantan; Sengkang in South Sulawesi; and Buzi in Mozambique. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

3.Name: Mr. Achmad  Badrun
